name: wallabag
description: Wallabag is a self-hosted read-it-later service. It saves articles from the web, cleans them up for reading, and organizes content with tags and full-text search, with mobile apps and browser integrations available.

features.title: Article Saving
features.description: Capture web articles with a single click using browser extensions or bookmarklets for later reading

features.title: Content Extraction
features.description: Automatically strip ads, navigation, and clutter to present clean, readable article text

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find saved articles using powerful search across titles, content, and tags

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize articles with custom tags for easy categorization and retrieval

features.title: Reading Progress
features.description: Track reading status with archive, favorite, and unread markers to manage your reading queue

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your reading list on iOS and Android with native apps that sync seamlessly

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Generate RSS feeds from your saved articles or tags for integration with feed readers

features.title: Annotations
features.description: Highlight text and add notes directly within articles for research or reference purposes
